nodes.text: Batuubucha Tea was a fruit-flavored tea from Batuu that was fermented and bubbly, and was rumored to have health benefits. After centuries of enjoyment by local Batuuans, it gained popularity among the wealthy of the Core Worlds.

In 34 ABY, Batuubucha tea was served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Black Spire Outpost. When Strono Tuggs was the visiting chef, he sold it at his mobile restaurant, Tuggs' Grub. Ylena, who was a member of the Gatherers on Batuu and a Resistance supporter, drank the tea when she had lunch with Dolin before he assisted with sabotaguing the First Order's mobile habitat.

This drink is found at all mealtimes in the real world Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge in Disneyland only. The menu's description reads, "Suja pineapple passionfruit kombucha."
